text: avanre phalasamrd'dhi (nasattal) valayam ceyyappettu. ava (teattannal) avayute pantalukaleate vinatinn kitakkave tan atil celavaliccatinre peril avan (nastabeadhattal) kai malarttunnavanayittirnnu. enre raksitavineat areyum nan pankucerkkatirunnenkil etra nannayirunnene enn avan parayukayum ceytkeantirunnu
